item.title: 中国取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒的关税，结束长达三年的贸易冻结
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，中国将从 3 月 29 日起取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收的反倾销和反补贴关税，结束长达三年的惩罚性征税，为澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商提供期待已久的救济。【原文：China will lift anti-dumping and anti-subsidy tariffs on Australian wine from March 29, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Thursday, ending three years of punitive levies and offering long-awaited relief to Australian wine producers.】

item.title: 进口关税结束后，库藏葡萄酒将恢复在中国的销售
item.description: 在中国商务部表示将从 3 月 29 日起取消澳大利亚葡萄酒进口关税后，Treasury Wine Estates 公司周四表示，将恢复其部分产品在中国的销售。【原文：Treasury Wine Estates will resume the distribution of some of its products in China, it said on Thursday, after the Chinese Ministry of Commerce said it would remove tariffs on Australian wine imports from March 29.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴回购菜鸟，瞄准竞争对手的海外扩张之路
item.description: 分析人士说，阿里巴巴计划收购其物流子公司的全部控制权，而不是将其分拆上市，这可能预示着这家中国巨头正在海外市场更加认真地对待来自电商竞争对手申银万国和特姆普的竞争。【原文：Alibaba's plan to buy full control of its logistics subsidiary rather than spinning it off could signal the Chinese giant is taking competition from e-commerce rivals Shein and Temu more seriously in overseas markets, analysts said.】

item.title: 在 "充满挑战 "的市场环境下，JD Sports 一月销售额下降
item.description: 英国运动服装零售商 JD Sports 表示，由于 1 月份同类销售额下降，第四季度仅增长了 0.1%，贸易形势依然严峻。【原文：British sportswear retailer JD Sports said trading conditions remained challenging after its like-for-like sales dropped in January, resulting in fourth-quarter growth of just 0.1%.】

item.title: 瑞银仍在审查瑞士信贷的账簿错报风险
item.description: 瑞银表示，它仍在审查瑞士信贷财务报告中可能存在的错报，与监管机构就解决这一问题的谈判仍在进行中。【原文：UBS said it is still reviewing potential misstatements in Credit Suisse's financial reports and talks with regulators to address the issue are ongoing.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席财务官表示，与 Spirit 保持稳定关系非常重要
item.description: 在竞争对手波音公司酝酿收购空中客车公司之际，空中客车公司首席财务官托马斯-托普费尔（Thomas Toepfer）周四在接受报纸采访时强调了与供应商精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）保持稳定关系的重要性。【原文：Airbus , Chief Financial Officer Thomas Toepfer stressed the importance of a stable relationship with supplier Spirit AeroSystems , in a newspaper interview published on Thursday, as rival Boeing mulls plans to buy the firm.】

item.title: 解说员：日本采取何种干预措施来提振疲软的日元？
item.description: 由于交易商预期央行进一步加息的步伐将十分缓慢，从而推动日元贬值，日本政府再次面临压力，以应对日元的持续贬值。【原文：Japanese authorities are facing renewed pressure to combat a sustained depreciation in the yen, as traders drive down the currency on expectations that any further interest rate hikes by the central bank will be slow in forthcoming.】

item.title: 瑞银希望在合并后的绿色改革中保留并增加航运贷款
item.description: 瑞银集团高管告诉路透社，瑞银将寻求增加对航运业的贷款，并取消从瑞士信贷继承的对化石燃料客户的部分贷款，这是迄今为止对大型合并对银行可持续发展承诺影响的最大考验。【原文：UBS will look to increase lending to the shipping sector and run off some loans to fossil fuel clients inherited from Credit Suisse, executives told Reuters, in the biggest test yet of the impact of a mega-merger on banks' sustainability commitments.】

item.title: 工业园区称中国比亚迪放缓越南电动车工厂计划
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪已放缓了在越南建设电动汽车工厂的计划，该工厂所在工业园区的一位经理周四在股东大会上表示。【原文：Chinese electric vehicles maker BYD has slowed down its plans to build an EV factory in Vietnam, a manager of the industrial park where the plant would be built told a shareholders meeting on Thursday.】

item.title: 瑞银报告 2023 年为首席执行官埃尔莫蒂支付 1440 万瑞士法郎
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）周四表示，其首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）在去年 3 月收购前竞争对手瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）后第二次接掌这家瑞士银行，并在 2023 年获得了 1440 万瑞士法郎的收入。【原文：UBS on Thursday said its CEO Sergio Ermotti picked up 14.4 million Swiss francs in 2023 after taking over the Swiss bank's helm for a second bout following its takeover of former rival Credit Suisse last March.】

item.title: 法国法雷奥公司将使用更多的谷歌云人工智能工具
item.description: 法国汽车零部件制造商法雷奥公司周四表示，将在法雷奥使用更多的谷歌云人工智能工具，这凸显了该技术在汽车行业日益增长的重要性。【原文：French car parts maker Valeo said on Thursday it would be using more Google Cloud AI tools at Valeo, highlighting the growing importance of the technology in the cars sector.】

item.title: 欧洲监管机构密切关注大烟草公司的新茶叶棒
item.description: 欧洲各国政府正在权衡对卷烟制造商的新型零烟草发热棒实施更严格的规定，以堵住这些产品上市仅数月就被利用的漏洞。【原文：European governments are weighing the introduction of tougher rules on cigarette makers' new zero-tobacco heat sticks, moving to close the loopholes they were designed to exploit just months after their launch.】

item.title: 第一季度全球并购回暖，大宗交易纷至沓来
item.description: 并购（M&A）在经历了 2023 年的低迷之后，在第一季度出现反弹，这得益于巨型交易的回归，令等待回暖的投资银行家和律师们欢欣鼓舞。【原文：Mergers and acquisitions (M&A) bounced back in the first quarter after a downbeat 2023, thanks to the return of mega deals, cheering investment bankers and lawyers waiting for a pick-up.】

item.title: 第一季度市场：迈向降息的狂野之旅
item.description: 全球债券和股票市场在第一季度结束时高歌猛进，投资者对主要央行的降息预期在乐观和悲观之间徘徊了数月，未来将出现更多剧烈波动。【原文：Global bond and equity markets are ending the first quarter on a high note, with investors poised for more wild swings ahead after months of the mood lurching between optimism and pessimism about prospective rate cuts from major central banks.】

item.title: 日本干预货币市场的历史
item.description: 日本当局本周召开了一次紧急会议，讨论日元疲软问题，并表示准备干预市场，以阻止他们所称的货币无序投机走势。【原文：Japanese authorities held an emergency meeting this week to discuss the weak yen and suggested they were ready to intervene in the market to stop what they described as disorderly and speculative moves in the currency.】

item.title: 在亚洲交易荒的背景下，印度在全球股权资本市场大放异彩
item.description: 银行家们表示，印度不断涌现的大宗交易和上市（如现代汽车公司 30 亿美元的首次公开募股）将吸引更多资金进入这个市场，该市场今年在全球股票资本市场交易中所占的份额已创下历史新高。【原文：India's bulging pipeline of large block trades and listings such as the $3 billion IPO of Hyundai Motor's unit will draw more funds to a market whose share of global equity capital market deals has already hit a record this year, bankers said.】

item.title: 早间竞价日元交易员人心惶惶
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan.】

item.title: 外企退出俄罗斯造成的损失高达 1,070 亿美元
item.description: 路透社对公司文件和报表的分析表明，自 2022 年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来，企业纷纷撤离俄罗斯，导致外国公司减记和收入损失超过 1,070 亿美元。【原文：The corporate exodus from Russia since its 2022 invasion of Ukraine has cost foreign companies more than $107 billion in writedowns and lost revenue, a Reuters analysis of company filings and statements showed.】

item.title: 独家新闻美国情报官员告诉参议员：中国药明康德与北京共享美国客户数据
item.description: 据两位消息人士称，美国情报官员在二月下旬告诉正在起草一项生物技术安全法案的参议员，中国制药公司药明康德在未经同意的情况下将美国知识产权转让给了中国政府。【原文：U.S. intelligence officials in late February told senators working on a biotech security bill that Chinese pharmaceutical firm WuXi AppTec had transferred U.S. intellectual property to Beijing without consent, according to two sources.】

item.title: 市场：美联储再次尝试棘手的软着陆
item.description: 美联储即将实现美国经济罕见的软着陆，但它面临着另一个充满挑战的问题：在不扰乱市场的情况下减少金融体系中的现金。【原文：The Fed is close to delivering a rare soft landing for the U.S. economy but it faces yet another fraught challenge: reducing cash in the financial system without disrupting markets.】

item.title: 受中国和日本市场下滑影响，丰田 2 月份全球销量下滑 7
item.description: 丰田汽车 2 月份的全球销量同比下降了 7%，主要原因是中国农历新年假期导致销量大幅下降，以及日本小型汽车部门安全测试丑闻导致销量下滑。【原文：Toyota Motor's global sales dropped 7% in February from a year earlier, hurt by a heavy decline in China due to Lunar Year holidays and a slump in Japan after a safety test scandal at its small car unit.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命陈丽华和何家麟为中国区联席高级国家官员
item.description: 根据路透社周四查阅的一份备忘录，摩根大通已任命陈丽华（Rita Chan）和何亚伦（Alan Ho）为中国区联席高级国家官员。【原文：JPMorgan has appointed Rita Chan and Alan Ho as co-senior country officers for China, according to a memo reviewed by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国经济将为世界经济复苏提供强劲动力
item.description: 中国最高立法委员赵乐际周四表示，中国经济将为世界经济复苏提供强大动力，并承诺中国开放的大门只会越开越大。【原文：China's economy will provide a strong driving force for the world recovery, said the country's top legislator Zhao Leji on Thursday, promising the door of the country's opening can only get bigger.】

item.title: 日本政府发言人表示，日本不会排除货币走势的任何选项
item.description: 日本政府最高发言人周四表示，日本政府不排除采取任何方案来应对货币的过度波动。【原文：Japan's top government spokesman said on Thursday the administration would not rule out any options to counter against excessive currency moves.】

item.title: 日元受到干预观察；亚洲股市低迷
item.description: 尽管日本当局的干预威胁使投资者不敢将日元汇率推向新低，但日元周四仍在数十年来的最弱水平附近徘徊，而亚洲股市则在关键的美国通胀数据公布前上涨。【原文：The yen languished near its weakest in decades on Thursday though the threat of intervention from Japanese authorities kept investors leery of pushing the currency to a new low, while Asian stocks rose ahead of a key U.S. inflation reading.】

item.title: 中国人民币定盘价远高于市场预期
item.description: 中国央行将人民币定盘价设定为近五个月来与路透社预估的最大差距，当局正加大力度防止人民币大幅下跌。【原文：China's central bank set the yuan fixing at the widest gap against Reuters' estimate in nearly five months, as authorities step up efforts to prevent sharp declines in the currency.】

item.title: 美联储言论后美元坚挺；密切关注日元走势
item.description: 周四，美元兑主要货币汇率受到提振，因为一位美联储官员表示，在通胀胶着的情况下，他并不急于降息，而且交易员们也在为关键的经济数据做准备。【原文：The U.S. dollar received a boost against major currency peers on Thursday, as a Federal Reserve official said he wasn't in a hurry to cut rates amid sticky inflation, and as traders braced for key economic data.】

item.title: 投资者重新评估美国库存数据，油价上涨
item.description: 由于投资者重新评估了最新的美国原油和汽油库存数据，并重返买入模式，全球油价周四上扬，从连续两个交易日的跌势中回升。【原文：Global oil prices edged up on Thursday, recovering from two consecutive sessions of decline, as investors reassessed the latest U.S. crude oil and gasoline inventories data and returned to buying mode.】

item.title: 日本央行董事会对刺激政策退出后的经济实力看法不一，3 月份摘要显示了这一点
item.description: 日本央行 3 月份会议的意见摘要显示，日本央行决策者对经济是否足够强劲以经受住退出超宽松货币政策的考验存在分歧，这表明下一次加息可能需要时间。【原文：Bank of Japan policymakers were divided on whether the economy was strong enough to weather an exit from ultra-loose monetary policy, a summary of opinions at the bank's March meeting showed, suggesting the next interest rate hike may take time.】

item.title: 联合健康集团已向遭受网络攻击的医疗服务提供商支付了超过 33 亿美元的赔偿金
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周三表示，到目前为止，该公司已向受到 Change Healthcare 网络攻击影响的医疗服务提供商垫付了超过 33 亿美元。【原文：UnitedHealth Group said on Wednesday that it had advanced more than $3.3 billion so far to care providers impacted by the Change Healthcare cyberattacks.】
